Cal Cunningham: s claim is that his campaign has not accepted corporate PAC money and is not funded by "special interests."
The Center for Responsive Politics: CRP) verifies that Cunningham has not accepted money from business PACs, supporting his claim.
However: Cunningham has received money from PACs tied to individual senators, which receive funding from corporations.
The expert: s verdict questions the authenticity of Cunningham's claim, as he has received money that originated from corporations, albeit indirectly.
